column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Before I go further
column2: please know that the bartender who served you is one of our best. She is swift
column3: professional and polite and has literally served thousands of customers since joining us more than a year ago. My floor managers rarely
column5: have to deal with complaints on her behalf. So I would like to say upfront that I will weigh her account of events with an equal measure to yours -- it's only fair.
